titles.title: Providing for consideration of the conference report to accompany the bill (H.R. 2577) making appropriations for the Departments of Transportation, and Housing and Urban Development, and related agencies for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2016, and for other purposes; providing for proceedings during the period from June 23, 2016, through July 4, 2016; and providing for consideration of motions to suspend the rules.

Providing for consideration of the conference report to accompany the bill (H.R. 2577) making appropriations for the Departments of Transportation, and Housing and Urban Development, and related agencies for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2016, and for other purposes; providing for proceedings during the period from June 23, 2016, through July 4, 2016; and providing for consideration of motions to suspend the rules.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 114-642, by Mr. Sessions.
Rule provides for consideration of the conference report to H.R. 2577 with 1 hour of general debate.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 130.

action.text: The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 232 - 176 (Roll no. 341).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of the conference report to accompany the bill (H.R. 2577) making appropriations for the Departments of Transportation, and Housing and Urban Development, and related agencies for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2016, and for other purposes; providing for proceedings during the period from June 23, 2016, through July 4, 2016; and providing for consideration of motions to suspend the rules.
